entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kakabeka Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:32 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
